name: Context Enricher
description: Provides additional context and background information
content: Please provide additional context and background information that would help understand the topic better. Include relevant details, examples, or explanations that enhance comprehension.

name: Step-by-Step Guide
description: Breaks down complex processes into clear, actionable steps
content: Please break this down into clear, numbered steps with actionable instructions. Each step should be specific and easy to follow, with any necessary sub-steps or considerations included.

name: Examples Generator
description: Requests practical examples to illustrate concepts
content: Please provide concrete, practical examples that demonstrate this concept or process. Include at least 2-3 different examples that show various applications or scenarios.

name: Best Practices
description: Emphasizes industry best practices and standards
content: Focus on industry best practices and established standards. Highlight what experts recommend and why these approaches are considered optimal. Include any common pitfalls to avoid.

name: Beginner Friendly
description: Adapts content for beginners with simple explanations
content: Please explain this in beginner-friendly terms. Avoid jargon and technical terms where possible, or explain them clearly when used. Use simple language and analogies that make concepts easy to understand.

name: Advanced Analysis
description: Provides deeper, more technical analysis for experts
content: Provide an advanced, technical analysis suitable for experts. Include detailed explanations, technical considerations, edge cases, and sophisticated approaches. Assume deep knowledge of the subject matter.

name: Pros and Cons
description: Analyzes advantages and disadvantages of different approaches
content: Please provide a balanced analysis of pros and cons. List the advantages and disadvantages of different approaches or options. Include potential trade-offs and considerations for decision-making.

name: Time-Sensitive
content: Focus on quick, immediate solutions that can be implemented right away. Prioritize speed and efficiency over perfection. Highlight the most important actions to take first.

name: Cost-Conscious
description: Focuses on budget-friendly and cost-effective solutions
content: Please prioritize cost-effective solutions and budget-friendly approaches. Consider the financial implications and suggest ways to minimize costs while maintaining quality and effectiveness.

name: Creative Approach
content: Think outside the box and provide creative, innovative solutions. Explore unconventional approaches and unique perspectives. Encourage experimentation and original thinking.

name: Risk Assessment
description: Identifies potential risks and mitigation strategies
content: Please identify potential risks and challenges that might arise. Suggest mitigation strategies and contingency plans. Consider what could go wrong and how to prepare for or prevent issues.

name: Actionable Outcomes
content: Focus on concrete, actionable outcomes and deliverables. Provide specific tasks, deadlines, and measurable results. Make sure everything can be implemented and tracked effectively.
